info.title: Heart Rate Zone

sensor.heart.zone.description: This Resource describes a measured heart rate by the current Zone using the Zoladz method. The Zoladz method defines Zones based on maximum heart rate; Zone 1 is the lowest, Zone 5 is the highest. The heartRateZone is an enumeration containing one of: "Zone1", "Zone2", "Zone3", "Zone4", and "Zone5".

heartRateZone.description: Current heart rate zone based on the Zoladz system.
